movies.title: Chao ji wu di zhui nu zai
movies.plot: Four men (including a millionaire businessman trying to escape from the stress of his work) running a struggling sushi restaurant in Hong Kong follow a group of beauty-contest entrants to Thailand in the hopes of winning their hearts. The four misfits must convince the beauties of their worth as dates while fending off a gang of tough rivals. Will they succeed, or will they return home alone and broken-hearted?
movies.simplePlot: Four men (including a millionaire businessman trying to escape from the stress of his work) running a struggling sushi restaurant in Hong Kong follow a group of beauty-contest entrants to ...

biography.bio: Pak-Cheung Chan was born on September 7, 1958 in Hong Kong, China as Bai Qiang Chen. He is an actor and producer, known for Last Hero in China (1993), Flirting Scholar (1993) and King of Beggars (1992).
biography.name: Pak-Cheung Chan

biography.bio: Born in Taiwan, Qi Shu has won the prestigious Golden Horse Awards in Taiwan (regarded as the East Asian Oscars) for Best Supporting Actress. She has also received a nomination for Best Actress from the Golden Horse Awards. She appeared with Jackie Chan in the romantic comedy Gorgeous (1999) ("Gorgeous"). Her name is spelled in a variety of ways, including Hsu Qi, Hsu Chi, Qi Shu, and Shu Kei, and there are quite a few other variations on her name on foreign V.C.D.s, D.V.D.s, and internet sites.
biography.name: Qi Shu

biography.bio: Vivian Hsu was born on March 19, 1975 in Taichung, Taiwan as Shu Chuan Hsu. She is an actress and producer, known for Espion amateur (2001), Warriors of the Rainbow (2011) and The Sorcerer and the White Snake (2011). She has been married to Sean Lee since June 26, 2014.
biography.name: Vivian Hsu

biography.bio: Michael Tao was born on August 26, 1963 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Street Angels (1996), Hok king chut gaan (2007) and Chi meng sing siu yiu (2002).
biography.name: Michael Tao

biography.bio: Jerry Lamb was born on September 29, 1970 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for 3 go shou shang de jing cha (1996), Young and Dangerous 3 (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996). He has been married to Lily Hong since December 19, 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Jerry Lamb

biography.bio: Eric Kot was born on December 30, 1966 in Hong Kong as Kot Man-Fai. He is an actor and director, known for You Shoot, I Shoot (2001), July Rhapsody (2002) and Butterfly (2004).
biography.name: Eric Kot

biography.bio: Annabelle Lau is known for her work on Peace Hotel (1995), Bu yi tang de ma ma (1995) and Ai qing jia you zhan (1994).
biography.name: Annabelle Lau

biography.bio: Chi-Hung Chan is an actor, known for Hitman (1998), Zai shi zhui hun (1993) and Biao jie, ni hao ye! xu ji (1991).
biography.name: Chi-Hung Chan

biography.bio: Chi-Shing Chan is an actor and assistant director, known for City on Fire (1987), The God of Cookery (1996) and Shanghai Express (1986).
biography.name: Chi-Shing Chan

biography.bio: Joyce Chan is an actress, known for Chu lian wu xian Touch (1997), San chuen lao see II: Sik ji ngoc gwai (2000) and Ye boon saam dim jung (1997).
biography.name: Joyce Chan

biography.bio: Wai Hung Chan is an actor, known for Espion amateur (2001), The Sniper (2009) and Wan 9 zhao 5 (1994).
biography.name: Wai Hung Chan

biography.bio: Aman Chang is a director and actor, known for Yuen chi mo hei (1999), Hua gu long yu qian nian chong (1999) and Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998).
biography.name: Aman Chang

biography.bio: Wei Chi Cheong is an actress, known for Chao ji wu di zhui nu zai (1997).
biography.name: Wei Chi Cheong

biography.bio: Angie Cheung was born on November 4, 1973 in Ipoh, Malaysia. She is an actress, known for Yuen chi mo hei (1999), Du xia 1999 (1998) and Oi joi yue lok guen dik yat ji (1998).
biography.name: Angie Cheung

biography.bio: Hung On Cheung is an actor, known for Endless Love (1993), Time and Tide (2000) and Fei hu (1996).
biography.name: Hung On Cheung
